main.name: Brian Yun
main.bio:
I'm Brian Yun from South Korea. Currently studying @Yonsei University College of Medicine. 
 I'm a full stack ReactJS developer && iOS developer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coffee or anything else.

testimonials.text: Those times when you don't feel like working. You're too tired, you don't want to push yourself but you do it anyway. That is actually the dream.
Don't find a fault, find a remedy. Anybody can complain.
